snippet.title: The new frontier of interactive gaming | Vaudeville Demo | AI-driven whodunit
snippet.description:
From the sceneries to the illustrations, from the dialogues to the music, Vaudeville is an experimental whodunit game based on the latest AI technologies. This tale of murder, suspense and absurdity unfolds as you play, and you are the protagonist.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2240920?utm_source=youtube

#vaudeville #ai #aicharacters #madewithunity #kickstarter #kickstarterproject #whodunit #noir #inworld @inworldai
